description: Traditional fiat-pegged stablecoins yield no return, incurring significant opportunity costs in high-interest economies like Brazil. High Selic rates historically discourage stablecoin adoption due to lost potential earnings. Previous yield-bearing solutions faced tax and securities classification complexities, prompting this novel dual-token (BRLY/BRLV) and accumulating-token (wBRLY) architecture.
